ESPHome.description:
Create custom firmwares for your ESP8266/ESP32 boards. Contains the standalone ESPHome Command Line and Web Dashboard (HomeAssistant is a separate Rockon, whose OCI image does not allow for installing add-ons like this). The WebUI is accessible through the configured port, the ESPHome command line can be used by connecting to the OCI image via docker exec -it esphome /bin/bash.

Note: uses `net=host` and privileged capabilities to enable device connections for firmware updates. Typically, this Rockon would be run during firmware development or updating of devices and, when not needed, be stopped again. It's not necessary to be active for ESP devices to be recognized by Home Assistant.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
ESPHome.more_info: For updates of the application, consider installing the Watchtower Rock-on and run it periodically.
